'%/public/plugins/status-history%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/public/plugins/grafana-clock-panel%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/public/plugins/grafana-simple-json-datasource%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/public/plugins/grafana-azure-monitor-datasource%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-21972 VSphere Exploitation
description: Detects the exploitation of VSphere Remote Code Execution vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-21972
author: Bhabesh Raj
falsepositives: OVA uploads to your VSphere appliance
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query = '/ui/vropspluginui/rest/services/uploadova')

title: CVE-2021-33766 Exchange ProxyToken Exploitation
description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange ProxyToken vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-33766
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/ecp/%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/RulesEditor/InboxRules.svc/NewObject%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '500') OR (cs-uri-query LIKE '%SecurityToken=%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/ecp/%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '500'))

title: Exploitation of CVE-2021-26814 in Wazuh
description: Detects the exploitation of the Wazuh RCE vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26814
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE cs-uri-query LIKE '%/manager/files_path=etc/lists/../../../../..%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious RazerInstaller Explorer Subprocess
description: Detects a explorer.exe sub process of the RazerInstaller software which can be invoked from the installer to select a different installation folder but can also be exploited to escalate privileges to LOCAL SYSTEM
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Maxime Thiebaut
falsepositives: User selecting a different installation folder (check for other sub processes of this explorer.exe process)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (ParentImage LIKE '%\\RazerInstaller.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND IntegrityLevel = 'System') AND NOT (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Installer\\Razer\\Installer\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2021-26857 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects possible successful exploitation for vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26857 by looking for | abnormal subprocesses spawning by Exchange Server's Unified Messaging service
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\UMWorkerProcess.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE '%wermgr.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%WerFault.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: CVE-2021-44077 POC Default Dropped File
description: Detects the creation of "msiexec.exe" in the "bin" directory of the ManageEngine SupportCenter Plus (Related to CVE-2021-44077) and public POC available (See references section)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ManageEngine\\SupportCenterPlus\\bin\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2021-21978 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects the exploitation of the VMware View Planner vulnerability described in CVE-2021-21978
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%logupload%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%logMetaData%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%wsgi\_log\_upload.py%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Computer Account Name Change CVE-2021-42287
description: Detects the renaming of an existing computer account to a account name that doesn't contain a $ symbol as seen in attacks against CVE-2021-42287
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND (EventID = '4781' AND OldTargetUserName LIKE '%$%' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (NewTargetUserName LIKE '%$%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Log4j RCE CVE-2021-44228 in Fields
description: Detects exploitation attempt against log4j RCE vulnerability reported as CVE-2021-44228 in different header fields found in web server logs (Log4Shell)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:ldap:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:rmi:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:ldaps:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:dns:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%/$\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%\%24\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%$\%7Bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%\%2524\%257Bjndi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%\%2F\%252524\%25257Bjndi\%3A%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:${lower:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${::-j}${%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:nis%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:nds%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:corba%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${jndi:iiop%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%Reference Class Name: foo%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${${env:BARFOO:-j}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${::-l}${::-d}${::-a}${::-p}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${base64:JHtqbmRp%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${${env:ENV\_NAME:-j}ndi${env:ENV\_NAME:-:}$%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${${lower:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${${upper:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%${${::-j}${::-n}${::-d}${::-i}:%' ESCAPE '\') OR (cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:ldap:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:rmi:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:ldaps:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:dns:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/$\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%24\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%$\%7Bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%2524\%257Bjndi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%2F\%252524\%25257Bjndi\%3A%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:${lower:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${::-j}${%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:nis%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:nds%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:corba%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${jndi:iiop%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%Reference Class Name: foo%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${${env:BARFOO:-j}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${::-l}${::-d}${::-a}${::-p}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${base64:JHtqbmRp%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${${env:ENV\_NAME:-j}ndi${env:ENV\_NAME:-:}$%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${${lower:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${${upper:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${${::-j}${::-n}${::-d}${::-i}:%' ESCAPE '\') OR (cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:ldap:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:rmi:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:ldaps:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:dns:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%/$\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%\%24\%7bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%$\%7Bjndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%\%2524\%257Bjndi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%\%2F\%252524\%25257Bjndi\%3A%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:${lower:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${::-j}${%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:nis%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:nds%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:corba%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${jndi:iiop%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%Reference Class Name: foo%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${${env:BARFOO:-j}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${::-l}${::-d}${::-a}${::-p}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${base64:JHtqbmRp%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${${env:ENV\_NAME:-j}ndi${env:ENV\_NAME:-:}$%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${${lower:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${${upper:j}ndi:%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-referer LIKE '%${${::-j}${::-n}${::-d}${::-i}:%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-1675 Print Spooler Exploitation IPC Access
description: Detects remote printer driver load from Detailed File Share in Security logs that are a sign of successful exploitation attempts against print spooler vulnerability CVE-2021-1675 and CVE-2021-34527
author: INIT_6
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND EventID = '5145' AND ShareName LIKE '\\\\\*\\IPC$' ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName = 'spoolss' AND AccessMask = '0x3' AND ObjectType = 'File')

title: CVE-2021-1675 Print Spooler Exploitation Filename Pattern
description: Detects the default filename used in PoC code against print spooler vulnerability CVE-2021-1675
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\3\\old\\1\\123%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Antivirus PrinterNightmare CVE-2021-34527 Exploit Detection
description: Detects the suspicious file that is created from PoC code against Windows Print Spooler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2021-34527 (PrinterNightmare), CVE-2021-1675 .
author: Sittikorn S, Nuttakorn T, Tim Shelton
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Filename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (logs MATCH ('"File submitted to Symantec"')))

title: CVE-2021-1675 Print Spooler Exploitation
description: Detects driver load events print service operational log that are a sign of successful exploitation attempts against print spooler vulnerability CVE-2021-1675
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-PrintService/Operational' AND EventID = '316' AND (logs MATCH ('"UNIDRV.DLL, kernelbase.dll, " OR " 123 " OR " 1234 " OR "mimispool"')))

title: Potential SystemNightmare Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects an exploitation attempt of SystemNightmare in order to obtain a shell as LOCAL_SYSTEM
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%printnightmare.gentilkiwi.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% /user:gentilguest %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Kiwi Legit Printer%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Sitecore Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237
description: Detects exploitation attempts of Sitecore Experience Platform Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237 found in Report.ashx
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/sitecore/shell/ClientBin/Reporting/Report.ashx%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '200')

title: Serv-U Exploitation CVE-2021-35211 by DEV-0322
description: Detects patterns as noticed in exploitation of Serv-U CVE-2021-35211 vulnerability by threat group DEV-0322
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND CommandLine LIKE '%whoami%' ESCAPE '\' AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%./Client/Common/%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.\\Client\\Common\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\Serv-U.bat%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2021-40444 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation of CVE-2021-40444 via suspicious process patterns seen in in-the-wild exploitations
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @neonprimetime
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (Image LIKE '%\\control.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ParentImage LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((CommandLine LIKE '%\\control.exe input.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%\\control.exe" input.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Exploitation Attempt From Office Application
description: Detects Office applications executing a child process that includes directory traversal patterns. This could be an attempt to exploit CVE-2022-30190 (MSDT RCE) or CVE-2021-40444 (MSHTML RCE)
author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems), @SBousseaden (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (ParentImage LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\msaccess.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\mspub.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\eqnedt32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\visio.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%../../../..%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%..\\..\\..\\..%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%..//..//..//..%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Windows\\INetCache%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.cab' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.inf%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%AppData\\Local\\Temp%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Content.inf' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Fortinet CVE-2021-22123 Exploitation
description: Detects CVE-2021-22123 exploitation attempt against Fortinet WAFs
author: Bhabesh Raj, Florian Roth
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((cs-uri-query LIKE '%/api/v2.0/user/remoteserver.saml%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-method = 'POST') AND NOT (cs-referer LIKE '%/root/user/remote-user/saml-user/%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (cs-referer = ''))

title: CVE-2021-41773 Exploitation Attempt
description:
Detects exploitation of flaw in path normalization in Apache HTTP server 2.4.49.
An attacker could use a path traversal attack to map URLs to files outside the expected document root.
If files outside of the document root are not protected by "require all denied" these requests can succeed.
Additionally this flaw could leak the source of interpreted files like CGI scripts.
This issue is known to be exploited in the wild. This issue only affects Apache 2.4.49 and not earlier versions.
author: daffainfo, Florian Roth
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-uri-query LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%2e/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/icons/.\%2e/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%\%32\%65/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/icons/.\%\%32\%65/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%\%\%25\%33%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/icons/.\%\%\%25\%33%' ESCAPE '\') AND sc-status IN ('200', '301'))

title: CVE-2021-31979 CVE-2021-33771 Exploits by Sourgum
description: Detects patterns as noticed in exploitation of Windows CVE-2021-31979 CVE-2021-33771 vulnerability and DevilsTongue malware by threat group Sourgum
author: Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\physmem.sys%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\System32\\IME\\IMEJP\\imjpueact.dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\ime\\IMETC\\IMTCPROT.DLL%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\ime\\SHARED\\imecpmeid.dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\config\\spp\\ServiceState\\Recovery\\pac.dat%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\config\\cy-GB\\Setup\\SKB\\InputMethod\\TupTask.dat%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\config\\config\\startwus.dat%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\ime\\SHARED\\WimBootConfigurations.ini%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\ime\\IMEJP\\WimBootConfigurations.ini%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\system32\\ime\\IMETC\\WimBootConfigurations.ini%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-26858 Exchange Exploitation
description:
Detects possible successful exploitation for vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26858 by looking for
creation of non-standard files on disk by Exchange Servers Unified Messaging service
which could indicate dropping web shells or other malicious content
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND Image LIKE '%UMWorkerProcess.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE '%CacheCleanup.bin' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.txt' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.LOG' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.cfg' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%cleanup.bin' ESCAPE '\')))

title: ProxyLogon Reset Virtual Directories Based On IIS Log
description: When exploiting this vulnerability with CVE-2021-26858, an SSRF attack is used to manipulate virtual directories
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND sc-status = '200' AND cs-uri-stem = '/ecp/DDI/DDIService.svc/SetObject' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%schema=Reset%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%VirtualDirectory%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-username LIKE '%$' ESCAPE '\') OR ( = 'POST' AND  = '200' AND  = '/ecp/DDI/DDIService.svc/SetObject' AND  = 'schema=Reset' AND  = 'VirtualDirectory' AND  = '$'))

title: Exchange Exploitation CVE-2021-28480
description: Detects successful exploitation of Exchange vulnerability as reported in CVE-2021-28480
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-uri-query LIKE '%/owa/calendar/a%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-method = 'POST') AND NOT ((sc-status = '503')))

title: Possible Exploitation of Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
description: Detects log entries that appear in exploitation attempts against MS Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @testanull
falsepositives: Unknown, please report false positives via https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/issues
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'MSExchange Management' AND EventID IN ('6', '8') AND (Data LIKE '%Cmdlet failed. Cmdlet Get-App, %' ESCAPE '\' OR Data LIKE '%Task Get-App throwing unhandled exception: System.InvalidCastException:%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Successful Exchange ProxyShell Attack
description: Detects URP patterns and status codes that indicate a successful ProxyShell exploitation attack against Exchange servers
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Rich Warren
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/autodiscover.json%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/mapi/nspi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/EWS%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%X-Rps-CAT%' ESCAPE '\') AND sc-status IN ('200', '301'))

title: Exchange ProxyShell Pattern
description: Detects URL patterns that could be found in ProxyShell exploitation attempts against Exchange servers (failed and successful)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Rich Warren
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((sc-status = '401' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/autodiscover.json%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/mapi/nspi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/EWS%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%X-Rps-CAT%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (sc-status = '401' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%autodiscover.json_@%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%autodiscover.json\%3f@%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%3f@foo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%Email=autodiscover/autodiscover.json%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%json_@foo.com%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Pulse Connect Secure RCE Attack CVE-2021-22893
description: This rule detects exploitation attempts using Pulse Connect Secure(PCS) vulnerability (CVE-2021-22893)
author: Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-uri-query LIKE '%/dana-na/auth/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/dana-ws/%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/dana-cached/%' ESCAPE '\') AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%_id=%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%_token=%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%Secid\_canceltoken.cgi%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%CGI::param%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%meeting%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%smb%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%namedusers%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%metric%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: SonicWall SSL/VPN Jarrewrite Exploitation
description: Detects exploitation attempts of the SonicWall Jarrewrite Exploit
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/cgi-bin/jarrewrite.sh%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-user-agent LIKE '%:;%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%() {%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-user-agent LIKE '%/bin/bash -c%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Oracle WebLogic Exploit CVE-2021-2109
description: Detects the exploitation of the WebLogic server vulnerability described in CVE-2021-2109
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%com.bea.console.handles.JndiBindingHandle%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%ldap://%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%AdminServer%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Pingback Backdoor DLL Loading Activity
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '7' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND Image LIKE '%\\msdtc.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\oci.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Pingback Backdoor Activity
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\updata.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%config%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%msdtc%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%start%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%auto%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Pingback Backdoor File Indicators
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND Image LIKE '%updata.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\oci.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Conti NTDS Exfiltration Command
description: Detects a command used by conti to exfiltrate NTDS
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%7za.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\C$\\temp\\log.zip%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
description: Detects a command used by conti to find volume shadow backups
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%vssadmin list shadows%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%log.txt%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Conti Ransomware Activity
description: Detects a specific command used by the Conti ransomware group
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-m %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-net %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-size %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nomutex %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-p \\\\\*' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%$%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Conti Ransomware Database Dumping Activity Via SQLCmd
description: Detects a command used by conti to dump database
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (Image LIKE '%\\sqlcmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (CommandLine LIKE '%sqlcmd %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%sqlcmd.exe%' ESCAPE '\')) AND CommandLine LIKE '% -S localhost %' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%sys.sysprocesses%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%master.dbo.sysdatabases%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%BACKUP DATABASE%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Moriya Rootkit File Created
description: Detects the creation of a file named "MoriyaStreamWatchmen.sys" in a specific location. This filename was reported to be related to the Moriya rootkit as described in the securelist's Operation TunnelSnake report.
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\drivers\\MoriyaStreamWatchmen.sys' ESCAPE '\')

title: Goofy Guineapig Backdoor Service Creation
description: Detects service creation persistence used by the Goofy Guineapig backdoor
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'System' AND Provider_Name = 'Service Control Manager' AND EventID = '7045' AND ServiceName = 'GoogleUpdate' AND ImagePath LIKE '%rundll32%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImagePath LIKE '%FileProtocolHandler%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImagePath LIKE '%\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\GoogleUpdate.exe%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Goofy Guineapig Backdoor Potential C2 Communication
description: Detects potential C2 communication related to Goofy Guineapig backdoor
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (c-useragent = 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.71 Safari/537.36' AND cs-host = 'static.tcplog.com')

title: Potential Goofy Guineapig GoolgeUpdate Process Anomaly
description: Detects "GoogleUpdate.exe" spawning a new instance of itself in an uncommon location as seen used by the Goofy Guineapig backdoor
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (ParentImage LIKE '%\\GoogleUpdate.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\GoogleUpdate.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Google\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Update\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Goofy Guineapig Backdoor IOC
description: Detects malicious indicators seen used by the Goofy Guineapig malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\config.dat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\GoogleUpdate.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\GoogleUpdate\\tmp.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\goopdate.dll' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Goofy Guineapig Backdoor Activity
description: Detects a specific broken command that was used by Goofy-Guineapig as described by the NCSC report.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%choice /t \%d /d y /n >nul%' ESCAPE '\')

title: DarkSide Ransomware Pattern
description: Detects DarkSide Ransomware and helpers
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: UAC bypass method used by other malware
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%=[char][byte](''0x''+%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% -work worker0 -path %' ESCAPE '\') OR (ParentCommandLine LIKE '%DllHost.exe /Processid:{3E5FC7F9-9A51-4367-9063-A120244FBEC7}%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential BlackByte Ransomware Activity
description: Detects command line patterns used by BlackByte ransomware in different operations
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% -single %' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%del C:\\Windows\\System32\\Taskmgr.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%;Set-Service -StartupType Disabled $%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%powershell -command "$x =[System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetString([System.Convert]::FromBase64String(%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% do start wordpad.exe /p %' ESCAPE '\')))

title: FoggyWeb Backdoor DLL Loading
description: Detects DLL hijacking technique used by NOBELIUM in their FoggyWeb backdoor. Which loads a malicious version of the expected "version.dll" dll
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '7' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\ADFS\\version.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Small Sieve Malware Potential C2 Communication
description: Detects potential C2 communication related to Small Sieve malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-host = 'api.telegram.org' AND cs-uri LIKE '%chat\_id=2090761833%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri LIKE '%text=com/%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Small Sieve Malware File Indicator Creation
description: Detects filename indicators that contain a specific typo seen used by the Small Sieve malware.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Roaming\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%Microsift%' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\MicrosoftWindowsOutlookDataPlus.txt' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Small Sieve Malware Registry Persistence
description: Detects registry value with specific intentional typo and strings seen used by the Small Sieve malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '13' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%Microsift%' ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE '%.exe Platypus%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Small Sieve Malware CommandLine Indicator
description: Detects specific command line argument being passed to a binary as seen being used by the malware Small Sieve.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.exe Platypus' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Devil Bait Malware Reconnaissance
description: Detects specific process behavior observed with Devil Bait samples
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), NCSC (Idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%>>\%APPDATA\%\\Microsoft\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%.xml' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.txt' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%dir%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ipconfig /all%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%systeminfo%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%tasklist%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Devil Bait Potential C2 Communication Traffic
description: Detects potential C2 communication related to Devil Bait malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri LIKE '%/cross.php_op=%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri LIKE '%&dt=%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri LIKE '%&uid=%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Devil Bait Related Indicator
description: Detects the creation of ".xml" and ".txt" files in folders of the "\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft" directory by uncommon processes. This behavior was seen common across different Devil Bait samples and stages as described by the NCSC
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (Image LIKE '%\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.txt' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xml' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2010-5278 Exploitation Attempt
description:
MODx manager - Local File Inclusion:Directory traversal vulnerability in manager/controllers/default/resource/tvs.php in MODx Revolution 2.0.2-pl, and possibly earlier,
when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the class_key parameter.
author: Subhash Popuri (@pbssubhash)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE cs-uri-query LIKE '%/manager/controllers/default/resource/tvs.php_class\_key=../../../../../../../../../../windows/win.ini\%00%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential ACTINIUM Persistence Activity
description: Detects specific process parameters as used by ACTINIUM scheduled task persistence creation.
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%schtasks%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%create%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%wscript%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% /e:vbscript%' ESCAPE '\')

title: MERCURY APT Activity
description: Detects suspicious command line patterns seen being used by MERCURY APT
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-exec bypass -w 1 -enc%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%UwB0AGEAcgB0AC0ASgBvAGIAIAAtAFMAYwByAGkAcAB0AEIAbABvAGMAawAgAHsAKABzAGEAcABzACAAKAAiAHAA%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2022-21587 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts of CVE-2022-21587 an arbitrary file upload vulnerability impacting Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS). CVE-2022-21587 can lead to unauthenticated remote code execution.
author: Isa Almannaei
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneViewerXMLService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneUploaderService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneDownloadService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneOfflineLOVService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache LPE
description: Detects files created during the local privilege exploitation of CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%WindowsPowerShell\\Modules\\webAdministration\\webAdministration.psm1' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((User LIKE '%AUTHORI%' ESCAPE '\' OR User LIKE '%AUTORI%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential CVE-2022-46169 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts that target the Cacti Command Injection CVE-2022-46169
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/remote\_agent.php%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%action=polldata%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%poller\_id=%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%| base64 -d | /bin/bash`%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%7C\%20base64\%20-d\%20\%7C\%20\%2Fbin\%2Fbash\%60%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%`whoami%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%cmd%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Apache Spark Shell Command Injection - Weblogs
description: Detects attempts to exploit an apache spark server via CVE-2014-6287 from a weblogs perspective
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE cs-uri-query LIKE '%_doAs=`%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential CVE-2022-26809 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects suspicious remote procedure call (RPC) service anomalies based on the spawned sub processes (long shot to detect the exploitation of vulnerabilities like CVE-2022-26809)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some cases in which the service spawned a werfault.exe process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ParentImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%-k RPCSS%' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2022-31656 VMware Workspace ONE Access Auth Bypass
description:
Detects the exploitation of VMware Workspace ONE Access Authentication Bypass vulnerability as described in CVE-2022-31656
VMware Workspace ONE Access, Identity Manager and vRealize Automation contain an authentication bypass vulnerability affecting local domain users.
A malicious actor with network access to the UI may be able to obtain administrative access without the need to authenticate.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE cs-uri-query LIKE '%/SAAS/t/\_/;/%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious Sysmon as Execution Parent
description: Detects suspicious process executions in which Sysmon itself is the parent of a process, which could be a sign of exploitation (e.g. CVE-2022-41120)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton (fp werfault)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (ParentImage LIKE '%\\Sysmon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%\\Sysmon64.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\Sysmon.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\Sysmon64.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\conhost.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WerFault.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WerFaultSecure.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\wevtutil.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wevtutil.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Sysmon.exe%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image = '')))

title: OWASSRF Exploitation Attempt Using Public POC - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation attempt of the OWASSRF variant targeting exchange servers using publicly available POC. It uses the OWA endpoint to access the powershell backend endpoint
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-user-agent = 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/105.0.5195.54 Safari/537.36' AND cs-method = 'POST' AND sc-status = '200' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/owa/mastermailbox%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential OWASSRF Exploitation Attempt - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation attempt of the OWASSRF variant targeting exchange servers It uses the OWA endpoint to access the powershell backend endpoint
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND sc-status = '200' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/owa/%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%@%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%40%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((cs-user-agent IN ('ClientInfo', 'Microsoft WinRM Client', 'Exchange BackEnd Probes'))))

title: Potential Centos Web Panel Exploitation Attempt - CVE-2022-44877
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts that target the Centos Web Panel 7 Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution CVE-2022-44877
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/login/index.php%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%login=%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%login=$(%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%base64%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%subprocess%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%socket%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%${IFS}%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%cHl0aG9u%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%B5dGhvb%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%weXRob2%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2022-29072 Exploitation Attempt
description:
Detects potential exploitation attempts of CVE-2022-29072, a 7-Zip privilege escalation and command execution vulnerability.
7-Zip version 21.07 and earlier on Windows allows privilege escalation (CVE-2022-29072) and command execution when a file with the .7z extension is dragged to the Help>Contents area. This is caused by misconfiguration of 7z.dll and a heap overflow.
The command runs in a child process under the 7zFM.exe process.
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Image LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName = 'Cmd.Exe') AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\7zFM.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((CommandLine LIKE '% /c %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% /k %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% /r %' ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine = '')))

title: Atlassian Bitbucket Command Injection Via Archive API
description: Detects attempts to exploit the Atlassian Bitbucket Command Injection CVE-2022-36804
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/rest/api/latest/projects/%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%prefix=%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%00--exec%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-21554 QueueJumper Exploitation
description: Detects potential exploitation of CVE-2023-21554 (dubbed QueueJumper)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\Windows\\System32\\mqsvc.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wmic.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wsl.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Bumblebee Remote Thread Creation
description: Detects remote thread injection events based on action seen used by bumblebee
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '8' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (SourceImage LIKE '%\\wabmig.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\wab.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\ImagingDevices.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetImage LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Hermetic Wiper TG Process Patterns
description: Detects process execution patterns found in intrusions related to the Hermetic Wiper malware attacks against Ukraine in February 2022
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (Image LIKE '%\\policydefinitions\\postgresql.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (CommandLine LIKE '%CSIDL\_SYSTEM\_DRIVE\\temp\\sys.tmp%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% 1> \\\\127.0.0.1\\ADMIN$\\\_\_16%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%powershell -c %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\comsvcs.dll MiniDump %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\winupd.log full%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: BlueSky Ransomware Artefacts
description: Detect access to files and shares with names and extensions used by BlueSky ransomware which could indicate a current or previous encryption attempt.
author: j4son
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND ((EventID IN ('4663', '4656') AND (ObjectName LIKE '%.bluesky' ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE '%DECRYPT FILES BLUESKY%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (EventID = '5145' AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE '%.bluesky' ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE '%DECRYPT FILES BLUESKY%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: MSSQL Extended Stored Procedure Backdoor Maggie
description: This rule detects the execution of the extended storage procedure backdoor named Maggie in the context of Microsoft SQL server
author: Denis Szadkowski, DIRT / DCSO CyTec
falsepositives: Legitimate extended stored procedures named maggie
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Application' AND Provider_Name = 'MSSQLSERVER' AND EventID = '8128' AND Message LIKE '%maggie%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Raspberry Robin Dot Ending File
description: Detects commandline containing reference to files ending with a "." This scheme has been seen used by raspberry-robin
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine REGEXP '\\[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,32}\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,6}\.[ "']{1}')

title: Diamond Sleet APT Process Activity Indicators
description: Detects process creation activity indicators related to Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '% uTYNkfKxHiZrx3KJ%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT DNS Communication Indicators
description: Detects DNS queries related to Diamond Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Might generate some false positive if triggered by a user during investigation for example.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '22' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (QueryName LIKE '%3dkit.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%dersmarketim.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%galerielamy.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%olidhealth.com%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Diamond Sleet APT DLL Sideloading Indicators
description: Detects DLL sideloading activity seen used by Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '7' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Image LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Diamond Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Diamond Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\4800-84DC-063A6A41C5C' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Forest64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\readme.md' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Diamond Sleet APT Scheduled Task Creation
description: Detects registry event related to the creation of a scheduled task used by Diamond Sleet APT during exploitation of Team City CVE-2023-42793 vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND EventID = '4698' AND TaskName LIKE '\\Windows TeamCity Settings User Interface' ESCAPE '\' AND TaskContent LIKE '%uTYNkfKxHiZrx3KJ%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT Scheduled Task Creation - Registry
description: Detects registry event related to the creation of a scheduled task used by Diamond Sleet APT during exploitation of Team City CVE-2023-42793 vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ('12', '13', '14') AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%Windows TeamCity Settings User Interface%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Evidence Eraser
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to erase evidence from victim servers by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%cleanLL%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%usersfiles.war%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Path "$tomcat\_dir%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%SysAidServer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%sleep %' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%while(1)%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Launcher
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to launch their malware loader by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Starting user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\usersfiles\\user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Force "$wapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%(Sophos).%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest Cobalt Strike Download
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Lace Tempest to download Cobalt Strike as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden -c IEX ((new-object net.webclient).downloadstring(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/a'')%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest Malware Loader Execution
description: Detects execution of a specific binary based on filename and hash used by Lace Tempest to load additional malware as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (Image LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles\\user.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=B5ACF14CDAC40BE590318DEE95425D0746E85B1B7B1CBD14DA66F21F2522BF4D%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lace Tempest File Indicators
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific names or suffixes which was seen being used often in PowerShell scripts by FIN7
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles\\user.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles.war' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\leave' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\user.%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Onyx Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Onyx Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\ADFS\\bg\\inetmgr.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Mint Sandstorm - ManageEngine Suspicious Process Execution
description: Detects suspicious execution from ManageEngine as seen used by Mint Sandstorm
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), MSTIC (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (((ParentImage LIKE '%manageengine%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE '%ServiceDesk%' ESCAPE '\') AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\java%' ESCAPE '\') AND (((Image LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% echo %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-dumpmode%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-ssh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dmp%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%add-MpPreference%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%adscredentials%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%bitsadmin%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%certutil%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%csvhost.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%DownloadFile%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%DownloadString%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dsquery%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ekern.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex(%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-Expression%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup administrators%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%net group%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%net user%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%o365accountconfiguration%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%query session%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%samaccountname=%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%set-MpPreference%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%svhost.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%System.IO.Compression%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%System.IO.MemoryStream%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%usoprivate%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%usoshared%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%whoami%' ESCAPE '\') OR CommandLine REGEXP '[-/][Ee^]{1,2}[ncodema^]*\s[A-Za-z0-9+/=]{15,}')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%lsass%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%procdump%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%tasklist%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%findstr%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE '%\\wget.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%E:jscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%e:vbscript%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup Administrators%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%net%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%user%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableAntiSpyware%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableRestrictedAdmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wmic%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%process call create%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wmic%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%shadowcopy%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%vssadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%shadows%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wbadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%catalog%' ESCAPE '\'))) AND NOT (CommandLine LIKE '%download.microsoft.com%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%manageengine.com%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%msiexec%' ESCAPE '\'))

author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), MSTIC (idea)

(((Image LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% echo %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-dumpmode%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine OR CommandLine LIKE '%dsquery%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ekern.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex(%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-Expression%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup administrators%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine REGEXP '[-/][Ee^]{1,2}[ncodema^]*\s[A-Za-z0-9+/=]{15,}')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%lsass%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%procdump%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%tasklist%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%findstr%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE '%\\wget.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%E:jscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%e:vbscript%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup Administrators%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%net%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%user%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableAntiSpyware%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableRestrictedAdmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wmic%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%process call create%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE AND CommandLine LIKE '%shadows%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wbadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%catalog%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Mint Sandstorm - Log4J Wstomcat Process Execution
description: Detects Log4J Wstomcat process execution as seen in Mint Sandstorm activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), MSTIC (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\ws\_tomcatservice.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE '%\\repadmin.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - Proxy
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-host LIKE '%addatamarket.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%ans7tv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%anstv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%backuprabbit.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%businessvideonews.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%cloudsponcer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%datamarketplace.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%growthtransport.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%mobilegamerstats.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%snoweeanalytics.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%tagclick-cdn.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%topographyupdates.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%unlimitedteacup.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%virtuallaughing.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%web-trackers.com%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - DNS
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE query IN ('addatamarket.net', 'ans7tv.net', 'anstv.net', 'backuprabbit.com', 'businessvideonews.com', 'cloudsponcer.com', 'datamarketplace.net', 'growthtransport.com', 'mobilegamerstats.com', 'snoweeanalytics.com', 'tagclick-cdn.com', 'topographyupdates.com', 'unlimitedteacup.com', 'virtuallaughing.com', 'web-trackers.com')

title: UNC4841 - Download Compressed Files From Temp.sh Using Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a ".zip" or ".rar" files from "temp.sh". As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%https://temp.sh/%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Potential SEASPY Execution
description: Detects execution of specific named binaries which were used by UNC4841 to deploy their SEASPY backdoor
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND (Image LIKE '%/BarracudaMailService' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/resize2fstab' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/resize\_reisertab' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Barracuda ESG Exploitation Indicators
description: Detects file indicators as seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%/11111.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/autoins' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/BarracudaMailService' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core\_check.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/get\_fs\_info.pl' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/imgdata.jpg' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_att\_v2.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_bvp74\_auth.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_helo.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_reuse.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_helo' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_reuse' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intentbas' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mknod' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_attachment.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_content.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_require\_helo.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_rtf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_sender.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_udp.so' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/nfsd\_stub.ko' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_reisertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_risertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize2fstab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/rverify' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/saslautchd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/sendscd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/snapshot.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p7' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/t' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v2.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v31.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v35.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_version' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Download Tar File From Untrusted Direct IP Via Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a "tar" from an IP address that doesn't have a trusted certificate. As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND (Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP 'https://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND CommandLine LIKE '%--no-check-certificate%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.tar' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((CommandLine LIKE '%https://10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.16.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.17.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.18.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.19.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.20.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.21.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.22.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.27.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.28.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.29.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.30.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.31.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://169.254.%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: UNC4841 - Email Exfiltration File Pattern
description: Detects filename pattern of email related data used by UNC4841 for staging and exfiltration
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '11' AND TargetFilename REGEXP '/mail/tmp/[a-zA-Z0-9]{3}[0-9]{3}\.tar\.gz')

title: UNC4841 - SSL Certificate Exfiltration Via Openssl
description: Detects the execution of "openssl" to connect to an IP address. This techniques was used by UNC4841 to exfiltrate SSL certificates and as a C2 channel with named pipes. Investigate commands executed in the temporal vicinity of this command.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Image LIKE '%/openssl' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND CommandLine LIKE '%s\_client%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-quiet%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-connect%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%:443%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:8080%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lazarus APT DLL Sideloading Activity
description: Detects sideloading of trojanized DLLs used in Lazarus APT campaign in the case of a Spanish aerospace company
author: Thurein Oo, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '7' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramShared\\PresentationHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE ':\\ProgramShared\\mscoree.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorcpl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorui.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\fixmapi.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\mapistub.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\tabcal.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\HID.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential APT Mustang Panda Activity Against Australian Gov
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Mustang Panda in a targeted attack against the Australian government as reported by Lab52
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%copy SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%SolidPDF%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential POWERTRASH Script Execution
description: Detects potential execution of the PowerShell script POWERTRASH
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.Compression.DeflateStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.MemoryStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GetDelegateForFunctionPointer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%.Invoke()%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GlobalAssemblyCache%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential APT FIN7 POWERHOLD Execution
description: Detects execution of the POWERHOLD script seen used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%$env:APPDATA%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%function MainPayload%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::WriteAllBytes%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%wscript.exe%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential APT FIN7 Reconnaissance/POWERTRASH Related Activity
description: Detects specific command line execution used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs for reconnaissance and POWERTRASH execution
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%-noni -nop -exe bypass -f \\\\\*' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%ADMIN$%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%-ex bypass -noprof -nolog -nonint -f%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential APT FIN7 Related PowerShell Script Created
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific name or suffix which was seen being used often by FIN7 PowerShell scripts
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '11' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\_64refl.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'host\_ip.ps1' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - DNS
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '22' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND (QueryName LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msedgeupdate.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - Netcon
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '3' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND Image LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Malicious DLL Load By Compromised 3CXDesktopApp
description: Detects DLL load activity of known compromised DLLs used in by the compromised 3CXDesktopApp
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '7' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=7986BBAEE8940DA11CE089383521AB420C443AB7B15ED42AED91FD31CE833896%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA1=BF939C9C261D27EE7BB92325CC588624FCA75429%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%MD5=74BC2D0B6680FAA1A5A76B27E5479CBC%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=11BE1803E2E307B647A8A7E02D128335C448FF741BF06BF52B332E0BBF423B03%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA1=20D554A80D759C50D6537DD7097FED84DD258B3E%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%MD5=82187AD3F0C6C225E2FBA0C867280CC9%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=F79C3B0ADB6EC7BCC8BC9AE955A1571AAED6755A28C8B17B1D7595EE86840952%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA1=894E7D4FFD764BB458809C7F0643694B036EAD30%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%MD5=11BC82A9BD8297BD0823BCE5D6202082%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=8AB3A5EAAF8C296080FADF56B265194681D7DA5DA7C02562953A4CB60E147423%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA1=3B3E778B647371262120A523EB873C20BB82BEAF%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%MD5=7FAEA2B01796B80D180399040BB69835%' ESCAPE '\') OR sha256 IN ('7986BBAEE8940DA11CE089383521AB420C443AB7B15ED42AED91FD31CE833896', '11BE1803E2E307B647A8A7E02D128335C448FF741BF06BF52B332E0BBF423B03', 'F79C3B0ADB6EC7BCC8BC9AE955A1571AAED6755A28C8B17B1D7595EE86840952', '8AB3A5EAAF8C296080FADF56B265194681D7DA5DA7C02562953A4CB60E147423') OR sha1 IN ('BF939C9C261D27EE7BB92325CC588624FCA75429', '20D554A80D759C50D6537DD7097FED84DD258B3E', '894E7D4FFD764BB458809C7F0643694B036EAD30', '3B3E778B647371262120A523EB873C20BB82BEAF') OR md5 IN ('74BC2D0B6680FAA1A5A76B27E5479CBC', '82187AD3F0C6C225E2FBA0C867280CC9', '11BC82A9BD8297BD0823BCE5D6202082', '7FAEA2B01796B80D180399040BB69835')))

title: Potential Suspicious Child Process Of 3CXDesktopApp
description: Detects potential suspicious child processes of "3CXDesktopApp.exe". Which could be related to the 3CXDesktopApp supply chain compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND ParentImage LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - Proxy
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-host LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\')

Product = '3CX Desktop App') AND FileVersion LIKE '%18.12.%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=DDE03348075512796241389DFEA5560C20A3D2A2EAC95C894E7BBED5E85A0ACC%' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Update Activity
description: Detects the 3CXDesktopApp updater downloading a known compromised version of the 3CXDesktopApp software
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational' AND Image LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp\\app\\update.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%--update%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/electron/update/win32/18.12%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp ICO C2 File Download
description: Detects potential malicious .ICO files download from a compromised 3CXDesktopApp via web requests to the the malicious Github repository
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (c-uri LIKE '%IconStorages/images/main/icon%' ESCAPE '\' AND c-uri LIKE '%.ico%' ESCAPE '\')

title: PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation Related Indicators
description: Detects exploitation indicators related to PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '1' AND Channel = 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% /c %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-OutFile%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%msiexec %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/i %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/qn %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%IntegratorLogin=fimaribahundq%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: PaperCut MF/NG Potential Exploitation
description: Detects suspicious child processes of "pc-app.exe". Which could indicate potential exploitation of PaperCut
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Huntress DE&TH Team (idea)
